alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 10:51AM AKST until March 02 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW THROUGH WEDNESDAY NIGHT FOR THE NORTHERN AND CENTRAL PANHANDLE... A storm force low over northern gulf coast continues to send plently of moisture and wind into the panhandle today. Snowfall amounts of 5 to 10 inches have been reported over the northern inner channels and portions of the central inner channels Wednesday morning. Some blowing snow has also been seen with visibilities down to a quarter mile or less at times. The southern panhandle and Sitka have warmed enough to change to rain, but have been seeing gusts to 45 mph. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow continuing. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph with blowing snow and reduced visibilities. * WHERE...Northern inner channels. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall expected through the day Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
